T02D2378:11b-1: b'a yu ta ttvam bh'a ba na n'a ma /
T02D2378:11b-3: rlung gi de nyid bsgom pa'i man ngag ces bya ba /
T02D2378:11b-4: bla ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2378:11b-5: dur khrod ma ni lhan skyes rtogs pa med //
T02D2378:11b-6: phra zhing mi dmigs rang bzhin yid 'ong ba //
T02D2378:11b-7: padma'i dbus 'gyur sna tshogs rol mdzad de //
T02D2378:11b-8: dus kyi stobs kyis dpa' bo gnyis med pa //
T02D2378:11b-9: nam mkhar khyab cing thim par dmigs pa med //
T02D2378:11b-10: mnyam pa'i bde rtogs skad cig gcig la ni //
T02D2378:11b-11: khams gsum g-yo zhing bde lta rtogs pa ste //
T02D2378:11b-12: bla ma'i bka' yis gang yang lhan skyes so //
T02D2378:11b-13: bla mas ma rtogs lhan skyes gzhan du min //
T02D2378:11b-14: yon tan rnams la nga rgyal ma byed kye //
T02D2378:11b-15: lhan cig skyes pa'i gnyid log myos 'gyur ba//
T02D2378:11b-16: dam tshig glang chen lta bur spyod //
T02D2378:11b-17: dbang po sgo dgu'i sngags kyis lam bkag pas //
T02D2378:11b-18: brtan pa'i bum pas de ni mya ngan 'das //
T02D2378:11b-20: brtan par bcings na mgon po 'chags par 'gyur //
T02D2378:11b-21: rlung nyid thim pas mi 'gyur kha dog med //
T02D2378:11b-22: 'brel med dran sems nyid ni stong pa la //
T02D2378:11b-23: bsgoms dang bsgom rgyu sgom byed de la med //
T02D2378:11b-24: g-yo ba'i sems nyid ting nge 'dzin gyis ni //
T02D2378:11b-25: sems kyi rgyal po brtan med mkha' la lding //
T02D2378:11b-26: mnyam par non cig lus kyi 'khrul 'khor bya //
T02D2378:11b-27: sems nyid bde chen bkram pas mya ngan 'das //
T02D2378:11b-28: gti mug zhags pas bcings shing gzhan dag spongs //
T02D2378:11b-29: skad cig gcig la 'khor ba'i chags pa bral //
T02D2378:11b-30: de nyid bcings pas bya ba bral 'gyur ba //
T02D2378:11b-31: 'gro ba drug tu yang dag skye mi len //
T02D2378:11b-32: gang zhig rtsa sgor ma yengs gnas ba des //
T02D2378:12a-0: drag po'i rkun mas de la @12a * //
T02D2378:12a-2: gang zhig brdzun rku brdzun mi mya ngan med //
T02D2378:12a-3: sngags nyid rang gi lus la gnas pa ste //
T02D2378:12a-4: bde ba thams cad rnal 'byor dran par gyis //
T02D2378:12a-5: bde ba rtogs pas rnal 'byor skyes 'gyur ba //
T02D2378:12a-6: khyim gyi bdag mo rang lus rang bzhin tshim gnas la /
T02D2378:12a-7: rlung gi sems nyid padma'i chu dang 'dra //
T02D2378:12a-8: 'byung ba rnams ni de yis myong 'gyur bas //
T02D2378:12a-9: de phyir g-yo ba'i sems la rnal 'byor pa'i //
T02D2378:12a-10: sgo dgu bkag nas nan tan gyis //
T02D2378:12a-11: rnal 'byor gyis ni gti mug bcad byas la //
T02D2378:12a-12: gnas kyi yon tan rtogs pas chags med 'gyur //
T02D2378:12a-13: sprin ltar cho 'phrul rang bzhin kun brtags kyi //
T02D2378:12a-14: gti mug gnas kyi gti mug bsregs byas nas //
T02D2378:12a-15: lhan cig skyes pa'i gnas la rnal 'byor thim //
T02D2378:12a-16: thams cad nub pas steng 'og lam 'gags pas //
T02D2378:12a-17: gnas kyi nyams kyis 'khor ba mya ngan 'das //
T02D2378:12a-18: de ni rnal 'byor bla ma'i drin gyis rtogs //
T02D2378:12a-19: nyin mtshan bla ma spyi bor bsgom byas nas //
T02D2378:12a-20: lhan cig skyes pa nyid du gnas 'gyur ba //
T02D2378:12a-21: yang nas yang du nam mkha'i bdud rtsi rngub //
T02D2378:12a-22: rjes 'brang bkur sti dri med sku thob pas //
T02D2378:12a-23: ka ba gcig la gzhal yas sgo dgu ste //
T02D2378:12a-24: lam gyi sgyu lus bdag gis gcig tu rtogs //
T02D2378:12a-25: de yis bdud bzhi bar gcod sel bar 'gyur //
T02D2378:12a-26: de phyir dge sbyin khrims sogs dgos mi 'gyur //
T02D2378:12a-27: dge sbyong chos smras lha nyid bsgom pa ste //
T02D2378:12a-28: chos kyi ro ni sus kyang rtogs pa med //
T02D2378:12a-29: sku gsum brtan par 'dod na rnal 'byor kye //
T02D2378:12a-30: phyi nang byang chub sems kyi rlung nyid bsgom //
T02D2378:12a-31: dug lnga'i yan lag bcad pas myur du ni //
T02D2378:12a-32: byang chub sems kyi lam la legs par 'jug / rnal 'byor brtan pa thob ste skye mi 'gyur //
T02D2378:12a-33: rlung gi de nyid bsgom pa'i man ngag ces bya
